FuncDef: This command specifies the explicit default sub-id for dynamic subscriber hosts (including ARP hosts) in case that the sub-id string is not supplied through RADIUS or LUDB.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies the sub-id name-id on which the original request for host creation arrived (DHCP Discover, or PADI or ARP Request).
Explicitly configured sub-id name up to 32 characters.
Specifies the concatenated string of auto-sub-id-keys separated by a "|" character. ParamDefault: Default- no def-sub-id
